meta.description: Discover JetCare™ active serums, specially designed for JetPeel™ hydroporation technology. High-quality skincare products with optimal results.
meta.keywords: JetPeel, JetCare, active serums, skincare, beauty

header.title: JetCare™ - Active Serums
header.subtitle: Original JetCare™ active serums are developed to achieve optimal results with JetPeel™ hydroporation.

hero.description:
Original JetPeel™ active serums by TavTech.
Specially formulated for JetPeel™ hydroporation technology, JetCare™ serums are perfectly matched to the unique delivery mechanism of the handpieces.

JetCare™ serums are tailored with precise viscosity to withstand high pressure and speeds up to 720 km/h without losing their molecular integrity or effectiveness.

Only the combination of patented JetPeel™ handpieces and JetCare™ active ingredients enables deep hydroporation and consistently optimal treatment results.

Results are immediately visible and noticeable, and the effects of the serums are long-lasting.

For the best results, a series of treatments is recommended, and to maintain the results, periodic treatments should be repeated as needed.

indications.title: Indications:
list: ✔ Aging, regenerating skin, wrinkles, loss of skin elasticity
✔ Impurities such as acne and blackheads
✔ Under-eye puffiness, eye lift, lip volume enhancement

sequence.title: Best anti-aging solutions with JetPeel
